projectsData.title: Cleaning Company
projectsData.shortDescription: Modern website for cleaning company with online appointment booking and custom quote requests
projectsData.fullDescription: Development of a complete website for a professional cleaning company. The platform presents all residential and commercial cleaning services, with an online appointment booking system and fully customized quote request forms. The responsive and clean design reinforces the company's professional image.
features: Presentation of residential and commercial cleaning services
Online appointment booking system with time slot selection
Custom quote request forms by service type

projectsData.title: Modern Fast Food
projectsData.shortDescription: Attractive website for fast food with interactive menu and online ordering system
projectsData.fullDescription: Creation of a dynamic website for a fast food restaurant, showcasing the entire menu and promotions. The site includes an interactive menu with categories, appetizing product photos, and a direct contact system for takeout orders. The user interface is designed to stimulate appetite and facilitate navigation.
features: Complete menu with categorization (burgers, fries, drinks, desserts)
Promotions and special menus display system
Colorful and attractive design suited for young audience

projectsData.title: Chicken Restaurant
projectsData.shortDescription: Elegant website for specialized restaurant with menu presentation and online reservation
projectsData.fullDescription: Creation of a sophisticated website for a restaurant specialized in chicken-based dishes. The platform presents the complete gastronomic menu, the restaurant's history, and allows customers to order quickly or in advance. The warm and elegant design reflects the establishment's friendly atmosphere.
features: Complete presentation of the menu and specialties

projectsData.title: Construction and Renovation Company
projectsData.shortDescription: Professional website for construction company presenting services and achievements
projectsData.fullDescription: Development of a corporate website for a construction and renovation company. The platform presents all services (new construction, renovation, development), showcase of achievements with photo gallery, and customized quote request system. The robust and professional design inspires trust and expertise.
features: Presentation of construction and renovation services
Portfolio gallery of achievements with filters by project type

projectsData.title: Ship Call Monitoring
projectsData.shortDescription: Complete ERP solution for real-time management and monitoring of ship calls
projectsData.fullDescription: Development of a complete ERP web application dedicated to comprehensive management of ship calls. This solution covers the entire process from arrival announcement to ship departure, including real-time monitoring of all port movements, multi-user management by departments, and tracking of collegial decisions. The system includes customized dashboards, a complete audit log and advanced reporting features.
features: Real-time ship tracking from announcement to departure
Complete visualization of port movements and operation statuses
Customized dashboard with key performance indicators
User management by departments with role and permission system
Detailed audit log of all user activities
Generation and printing of official documents
Meeting management and collegial decision tracking
Responsive interface adapted to different port services

img.alt: Main dashboard of the call management system

projectsData.title: Real Estate Agency Management
projectsData.shortDescription: Complete desktop real estate management application with property, client and transaction management
projectsData.fullDescription: Development of complete desktop software for real estate agency allowing centralized management of real estate properties, buyer and seller clients, and transaction tracking. The application includes a mandate management module, visit calendar, commission financial tracking, and advanced property search and filtering features.
features: Complete management of real estate property portfolio
Client database (buyers and sellers) with history
Financial management module and commission calculation
Advanced search system with multiple criteria
Generation of contracts and legal documents

img.alt: Main interface of real estate management software

hero.title: Privacy Policy and Cookies Management
hero.subtitle: Transparency and control of your personal data on our platform

commitment.title: Our commitment to your privacy
commitment.text1: At our company, protecting your personal data is an absolute priority. This policy explains how we collect, use and protect your information.
commitment.text2: We are committed to complying with GDPR and French regulations on data protection.

cookiesSection.title: Cookies Policy
cookiesSection.subtitle: Management of trackers and similar technologies
cookiesSection.cookiesDefinition: Cookies are small text files placed on your device when you browse. They are used to remember your preferences, analyze traffic and personalize your experience.

essential.title: Essential
essential.description: Necessary for website operation (security, cart, account)

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Website usage analysis (pages visited, loading times)

management.title: Consent management
management.text: You have full control over non-essential cookies. You can modify your preferences at any time.

dataSection.title: Personal data processing
dataSection.subtitle: How we collect and use your information
purposesList: Improvement of our products and services
dataSection.protectionText: We implement advanced security measures including:

rightsSection.title: Your GDPR rights
rightsSection.subtitle: Control of your personal data

access.title: Right of access
access.description: Obtain copy of your personal data

erasure.title: Right to erasure
erasure.description: Delete your data ('right to be forgotten')

objection.title: Right to object
objection.description: Object to processing for legitimate reasons

rightsSection.exerciseText: For any request regarding your personal data, please contact us at the address below. We will respond within a maximum of 30 days.

disableSection.title: Cookies deactivation
disableSection.subtitle: How to manage your browser settings
disableSection.text: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Here are guides for popular browsers:

contactSection.subtitle: Our Data Protection Officer
contactSection.text: For any questions regarding this policy or exercising your rights, contact our DPO:

contact.errorMessage: An error occurred, please try again.
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message. I will respond to you very quickly.
contact.formFooter: * Required fields. Your data is protected and will never be shared.

faqItems.question: What is your average response time?
faqItems.answer: I commit to respond to all messages within 24 business hours.

faqItems.question: Can I contact you for free advice?
faqItems.answer: Absolutely! I offer free 15-minute consultations to discuss your needs.

faqItems.question: Do you handle urgent requests?
faqItems.answer: Yes, for urgent requests, please mention it in your message and I will do my best to respond quickly.

faqItems.question: What topics can I discuss?
faqItems.answer: All topics are welcome: technical questions, advice requests, collaborations, or just to say hello!

faqItems.question: What are your response times?
faqItems.answer: I commit to respond to all requests within a maximum of 24 business hours. For complex projects, I will send you an initial response within 24h and a detailed quote within 48h.

faqItems.question: Can I meet you in person?
faqItems.answer: Absolutely! I am based in Paris and available for in-person meetings. For international or remote clients, I offer consultations via Zoom, Teams or Google Meet.

faqItems.question: What types of projects do you accept?
faqItems.answer: I work on a wide range of projects: showcase sites, e-commerce, web applications, redesigns, UI/UX design and SEO optimization. If your project requires specific expertise, I can refer you to trusted partners.

faqItems.question: Do you offer support after delivery?
faqItems.answer: Yes, I offer different levels of post-delivery support, ranging from minor bug fixes to comprehensive maintenance contracts including updates, backups and continuous improvements.

sectionTitles.sendMessageDesc: Fill out this form and I will respond as soon as possible.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Useful information about the quote process

items.question: What files can I attach to my request?
items.answer: You can attach any useful documents: images, mockups, PDF, design files (PSD, AI, FIG, SKETCH), Word/Excel documents, or any other file helping to understand your project.

items.question: How are my attached files processed?
items.answer: Your files are temporarily stored for project evaluation and deleted after quote generation. They are never shared with third parties.

items.question: Can I modify my request after sending it?
items.answer: Yes, if you need to make changes, simply reply to the confirmation email you will receive or contact me directly.

items.question: What happens after sending the quote?
items.answer: I will contact you to discuss your project details, refine the quote if necessary, and establish a realization schedule.

contactPage.title: Free Quote
contactPage.description: Get a personalized estimate of your project
